C
K
Alexander (May 4, 1923 - September 2, 1980) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi, onye na-ede egwu, na onye na-eme egwuregwu
N'ịbụ onye Lebanọn na ndị Siria, a mụrụ ya dịka Charles Khalil Saad na Cairo, Egypt, na Mee 4, 1923
C.K
gara Mahadum Cairo site n'afọ 1938 ruo 1939 nakwa Mahadum America dị na Cairo site n'afọ 1940 ruo 1941
Ọ gbanwere aha ya ka ọ bụrụ Charles Khalil Alexander mgbe ọ kwagara United States n'afọ 1942.
C.K
mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na ọrụ Khadja na mmepụta nke The Merry Widow na Cairo Royal Opera House n'afọ 1942
Mgbe ọ nọ n'Ijipt, ọ bụ onye otu New Vic Players na nke Cairo Dramatic and Musical Society
C.K
gara n'ihu mee ihe ngosi Broadway mbụ ya n'afọ 1946 na Plymouth Theatre na ọrụ Steward na Hidden Horizon, mmepụta nke ga-emechi mgbe naanị iri na abụọ gasịrị. Mgbe Hidden Horizon gasịrị, C.K
duziri oge ihe nkiri oge okpomọkụ na Duxbury, Massachusetts
Ọ laghachighị na Broadway ruo afọ 1950 mgbe ọ pụtara na ọrụ Uncle Louis na The Happy Time, ọzọ na Plymouth Theatre.
Ọ pụtara na telivishọn na The Defenders, The Adams Chronicles, na The Scarlet Letter
Alexander guzobere òtù abụọ na-enweghị uru Off Broadway: Company of Twelve na Theater Explorations Inc
C.K
nwụrụ na New York City na Septemba 2, 1980.
C.K
dere n'okpuru aha nke ya na n'okpuru pseudonyms Mario Quimber na Basheer Qadar
O dere egwu maka Francesca da Rimini, The Campbells of Boston, As Happy As Kings, Harlequinades for the Mourners, na The Justice Box
O dekwara ihe niile maka The Applegates, egwuregwu ọ ga-apụta na The Public Theater n'afọ 1978.
